cause.description:
Any one who has cancer, or knows somone who does, or just wants to help out, this is the cause group for you.
1. They are to weak to fight it themselves, we need to help them.
2. It's not fair to have something so horrible happen, to people who dont deserve it, and can do nothing to change it.
cause.mission: earn enough money to make a difference.
cause.name: Cancer
